email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this email finds you well.

Following our discussion, I am pleased to provide you with a firm offer for the shipment of Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston:

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Rotterdam
Discharge Port: Houston
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: OCEAN MASTER
Freight: USD 45/MT
Laycan: 25-30 March 2024

This offer is valid for 24 hours. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the prompt response.

USD 45/MT seems a bit high. Can you adjust the rate to USD 42/MT? Also, could you provide details on the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
Michael Olson
Steelworks Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Thank you for your feedback. I can adjust the rate to USD 43/MT. The vessel, OCEAN MASTER, has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 250 meters.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Laura,

USD 43/MT is acceptable. However, we need to adjust the laycan to 28 March - 02 April due to some delays in production. Can you accommodate this change?

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Yes, we can adjust the laycan to 28 March - 02 April. The freight rate will remain at USD 43/MT. Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Confirmed. Please send over the recap.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. Please find the recap below:

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Rotterdam
Discharge Port: Houston
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: OCEAN MASTER
Freight: USD 43/MT
Laycan: 28 March - 02 April 2024
Demurrage: USD 10,000 per day pro rata.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Ocean Cargo Brokers
